remarks.para: May be inoperative provided alternate procedures are established and used.

note.para: Any mode which is operative may be used.

numlitem.para: If ACARS is inoperative, Complete Flight Data Coupon as described in FOM, Chapter 3.
For International operations, the Captain will contact Flight Control to determine ATC and Company VHF communications requirements.
The Dispatcher and Captain will refer to OPS Spec A008 and reference FOM Communications Chapter 4 for additional information.

note.para: An operable ACARS unit is required for non-HF equipped aircraft operating within Europe.

placard.para: Placard ACARS "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
